text: Here's how to delete your Netflix history.
To delete your Netflix history,

you'll have to go through
and delete the movies
and shows you've watched one by one.
We'll delete the show "Sisters"
and the movie "Love, Guaranteed"
from our viewing history.
Launch your web browser on your computer
or mobile device and go to Netflix.com.
Log in to your account
and go to the drop-down arrow
next to your profile picture
in the top-right corner.
Click on "Account" from the drop-down.

Scroll down to find "PROFILE
& PARENTAL CONTROLS."

And select the downward
arrow next to your profile.
Next to "Viewing activity," click "View."

You'll now see all your
recently watched shows
and movies listed.
Find the show you want to remove

and select the "Hide from
viewing history" icon.
If it's a TV show,
you'll need to then select "Hide series?"

to confirm if you want to
remove the whole series.
Within 24 hours, it will no longer be
in your Netflix history.
